section.title: Hospital Discharge Instructions
section.text:
a. Diet: Follow Nutrition recommendations.
b. Medications: Take prescribed medications as advised.
c. Appointments: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week. Follow up with Outpatient facility for Immunosuppression treatment.
d. For Fever of > 42 degree Celsius or onset of chest pain/breathlessness contact Emergency.
e. Come in once a month to get a checkup of your weight and iron deficiency.
